name: Asteroid Storm (itch) (Derra)
description:
Sci-fi game reminiscent of the old spaceship games.

For people of any age, dodge or destroy the asteroids to win the game. 

Scoreboard with the best 10 scores to challenge yourself and your family and friends. 

Modern graphics with a retro feeling.
